body.bibl: Lieu, Samuel N. C. “Captives, Refugees and Exiles: A Study of Cross-Frontier Civilian Movements and Contacts between Rome and Persia from Valerian to Jovian.” In The Defence of the Roman and Byzantine East: Proceedings of a Colloquium Held at the University of Sheffield in April 1986, edited by Philip Freeman and David L. Kennedy, 2:475–505. BAR International Series 297, Monograph 8. Oxford: British Institute of Archaeology at Ankara, 1986.

Samuel N. C. Lieu, Captives, Refugees and Exiles: A Study of Cross-Frontier Civilian Movements and Contacts between Rome and Persia from Valerian to Jovian, in The Defence of the Roman and Byzantine East: Proceedings of a Colloquium Held at the University of Sheffield in April 1986, ed. Philip Freeman and David L. Kennedy, vol. 2, BAR International Series 297, Monograph 8 (Oxford: British Institute of Archaeology at Ankara, 1986), 475–505.
